title: The Story Behind The Ritual That Still Haunts Broadway
text:
The Story Behind The Ritual That Still Haunts Broadway 
Published By: Digg.com - Today 
For lots of cast and crew, the most atmospheric of all theater lights is a bare bulb called a “ghost light”....
